TEXT.TITLE: AUDEC IN PRIVATE PLACEMENT OF STOCK, WARRANTS
TEXT.BODY: <Audec Corp> said it sold privately 24 units, each consisting of 40,000 common shares and 40,000 redeemable common share purchase warrants, for a total of 480,000 dlrs. Audec said the sale was part of its plan to place a total of 28 units at 20,000 dlrs each. Reuter
